| HistoryText             = The Death's Head Squadron was a terrorist commando composed of [[Gnobians]] who wanted to accomplish [[Wolfgang von Strucker (Earth-616)|Baron von Strucker]]'s greatest dream, creating a new [[National Socialist German Workers Party (Earth-616)|Reich]].{{r|Nick Fury, Agent of S.H.I.E.L.D. Vol 3 1|2}} Their name, ''Death's Head'', was based on Strucker's personal commando during the [[World War II]], the original [[Death's Head Squadron (Nazi) (Earth-616)|Death's Head Squadron]].{{r|Sgt. Fury Vol 1 5}}

According to themselves, the [[Gnobians]] were a specie of aliens discovered by Baron von Strucker and [[Wilhelm Schmidt (Earth-616)|Wilhelm Schmidt]] near the village of [[Gruenstadt]] in [[Germany]], 1944.{{r|Nick Fury, Agent of S.H.I.E.L.D. Vol 3|5}} They helped Strucker building his future [[Hydra (Earth-616)|Hydra]] empire by giving him their advanced technology, which eventually led to the creations of the [[Life-Model Decoy|Life-Model Decoys]] and the [[Deltite (Earth-616)|Deltites]].{{r|Nick Fury, Agent of S.H.I.E.L.D. Vol 3 4|5}}

It was eventually revealed that the events of Gruenstadt have never happened and that the Gnobians were advanced [[Life-Model Decoy|LMDs]], unaware of their real origins and possibly had implanted memories, created by [[Arnim Zola (Earth-616)|Arnim Zola]] under Baron Strucker's orders.{{r|Fury #1}}
